context: The word 'märki' is part of the Estonian language. According to the dictionary definitions provided, it is either the partitive singular or illative singular form of the word 'märk'. The base word 'märk' means mark, sign, note, signal or indication in English. In the example context provided ('auto|stopp'), it relates to hitchhiking where a person makes a signal (mark) with their hand to stop cars.
